short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you to create Auv Engagement easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help you to create Engagement in Auvenir app easier.
On Portfolio page or in any Engagement creation step, you just need to click on this extension icon or press Ctrl + Q (or Ctrl + B for Microsoft Edge). Then all the data will be filled automatically.
Contact me if you get any error of if you have any suggestion.
